dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: The game starts in a dimly lit room.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I need to find a way out.

dialogues.speaker: Game guide
dialogues.text: Look around, there might be some useful objects.

dialogues.speaker: Game guide
dialogues.text: Great! Try to see if it opens one of the doors.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: The player successfully escapes the room.
